metadata.title: CVE-2016-5732 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the partition-rangeimplementation in templates/table/structure/display_partitions.phtml in thetable-structure page in phpMyAdmin 4.6.x before 4.6.3 allow remoteattackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via crafted tableparameters.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
